movie.title: The Miseducation of Cameron Post
movie.description_intro: In 1993, a teenage girl is forced into a gay conversion therapy center by her conservative guardians.
movie.description_full: In 1993, a teenage girl is forced into a gay conversion therapy center by her conservative guardians.

movies.title: The Sum of Us
movies.summary: Set in Sydney, Australia. A (heterosexual) father and his gay son are trying to find Ms/Mr Right respectively. The film shows their relationships with one another and the objects of their affection as tradgedy strikes. There is no overt 'message' in the film, just a very natural, entertaining story-telling.
movies.description_full: Set in Sydney, Australia. A (heterosexual) father and his gay son are trying to find Ms/Mr Right respectively. The film shows their relationships with one another and the objects of their affection as tradgedy strikes. There is no overt 'message' in the film, just a very natural, entertaining story-telling.

movies.title: The Master Strikes Back
movies.summary: A famous weapons instructor goes on a killing spree, packed with martial arts, after his son is kidnapped and castrated.
movies.description_full: A famous weapons instructor goes on a killing spree, packed with martial arts, after his son is kidnapped and castrated.
movies.synopsis: A famous weapons instructor goes on a killing spree, packed with martial arts, after his son is kidnapped and castrated.

movies.title: The 5th Wave
movies.summary: Four waves of increasingly deadly attacks have left most of Earth in ruin. Against a backdrop of fear and distrust, Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother. As she prepares for the inevitable and lethal fifth wave, Cassie teams up with a young man who may become her final hope - if she can only trust him.
movies.description_full: Four waves of increasingly deadly attacks have left most of Earth in ruin. Against a backdrop of fear and distrust, Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother. As she prepares for the inevitable and lethal fifth wave, Cassie teams up with a young man who may become her final hope - if she can only trust him.

movies.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
movies.summary: After the terrorist attacks on 9/11, Jack Ryan, studying at the London School of Economics, becomes a U.S. Marine fighting in Afghanistan, where his spine is critically injured when his helicopter is shot down. During the recovery, he meets Cathy Muller, the medical student helping him learn to walk again, and Thomas Harper, an official with the C.I.A. who recruits him. Ten years later, Ryan is working on Wall Street covertly for the C.I.A., looking for suspect financial transactions that would indicate terrorist activity. He discovers that trillions of dollars held by Russian organizations have disappeared, funds controlled by Viktor Cherevin. Ryan's employer conducts business with Cherevin, so when Ryan discovers certain accounts are inaccessible to him as an auditor, he has reason to visit Moscow and investigate. When investigating, he discovers a plot that is related to the 9/11 attacks. Now he has to figure out the what, where, and when.
